name: strava-club-results
description: Aggregate race results from running club members' Strava accounts

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=workers & npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=workers && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=strava-club-results
scripts.db:migrations:apply: cd workers && npx wrangler d1 migrations apply strava-club-db
scripts.db:migrations:list: cd workers && npx wrangler d1 migrations list strava-club-db
